en.hero_title: We protect your furniture with nano technologyâ€¦
en.hero_subtitle: So it stays clean, safe, and looking brand new for years.
en.hero_desc: Smart, long-lasting protection without changing the look or texture.
en.experience_label: Years of Experience in Nano Coating
en.services_intro: Protection of sofas, chairs, and mattresses against liquids and stains.
en.service1_desc: âœ” Protection of carpets and curtains with advanced nano coating technologyâœ” Preserves fabric color and quality without altering color or texture âœ” Invisible, organic protection that is 100% safe for children and pets.
en.service2_desc: âœ” Deep cleaning of sofas, chairs, mattresses, carpets, and curtainsâœ” Removal of tough stains and unpleasant odorsâœ” Complete sanitization using safe and approved productsâœ” Fast drying with no remaining moisture
en.service3_desc: âœ” Sealing marble surfaces against stains and damageâœ” Protection for wooden floors and surfacesâœ” Long-lasting shineâœ” High resistance to water and dirt
en.service4_title: We serve all across the UAE.
en.service4_desc: âœ” Dubaiâœ” Abu Dhabiâœ” Sharjahâœ” Ajmanâœ” Al Ainâœ” Fujairah
en.faq_a1: Nano coating is an invisible protective layer applied to fabrics and surfaces, forming a shield that prevents liquid, stain, and dust absorption, making cleaning much easier.
en.faq_q2: Does nano coating change the color or texture of furniture?
en.faq_a2: No. The layer is 100% transparent and does not affect color, softness, or overall appearance.
en.faq_q3: How long does the protection last?
en.faq_a3: Nano protection lasts up to 3 years or more, depending on usage and environment.
en.faq_q4: Is nano coating safe for children and pets?
en.faq_a4: Yes. The materials used are organic, safe, and free from harmful substances.
en.faq_q5: Whatâ€™s the difference between regular cleaning and nano coating?
en.faq_a5: Regular cleaning removes existing dirt only, while nano coating prevents stains and dirt from forming in the first place.
en.faq_q6: Can nano coating be applied to all types of furniture?
en.faq_a6: Yes, it is suitable for sofas, carpets, mattresses, curtains, chairs, car seats, and all fabric and leather surfaces.
en.faq_a7: It significantly reduces liquid and stain absorption and makes spills much easier to remove.
en.faq_q8: Does the service take a long time?
en.faq_a8: No. The process is fast and depends on item size. Furniture can often be used the same day or shortly after.
en.faq_q9: Are there any strong odors after application?
en.faq_a9: No. There are no strong odors, and the material is eco-friendly with no unpleasant residue.
en.faq_q10: Is the service suitable for homes and businesses?
en.faq_a10: Yes. We serve homes, offices, hotels, cafÃ©s, and restaurants.
en.faq_a11: We provide a quality warranty for 1.5 years, with nano protection lasting up to 3 years or more.
en.footer_contact: Contact us today and enjoy long-lasting protection
en.about_intro: At Nano Shark, we believe furniture is not just something you use every day â€” it is an investment in comfort, beauty, and lifestyle. From this belief, Nano Shark was founded to become one of the leading Nano Coating companies in the Gulf region, providing professional solutions to protect furniture and properties using the latest globally certified German nano technologies.
en.vision_text: To be the first choice in the Gulf region for smart and safe furniture protection, and to transform furniture care from temporary cleaning into long-term protection.
en.mission_text: We provide advanced nano solutions that keep furniture clean, protected, and long-lasting, without affecting color or texture, using materials that are safe for children, families, and pets.
why_list: Preserves original color, softness, and appearance
Protection lasting up to 3 years or more
services_list: Wood and marble insulation and protection
en.tagline: Nano Shark â€” We protect your furniture, to protect your comfort.
en.why_warranty_desc: Peace of mind with a long-term warranty covering protection quality and performance efficiency.
en.why_experience_desc: A specialized team with over 3 years of experience covering the UAE, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, and Oman.
en.why_cleaning_desc: Free dry cleaning and furniture sanitization before applying nano coating to ensure maximum protection and optimal results.
en.why_german_desc: High-quality German nano technology, safe for children and pets, without changing the fabric's color or texture.
en.why_support_desc: Customer service available around the clock to answer all inquiries.
en.why_followup_desc: A free visit after 6 months to monitor protection performance and ensure outstanding results continue.
